## Where next?{.smaller}
OK, some basics covered but where to go from here? (```F```= Free, ```*```=Discount, ```HO```=Hands on)

### Online
- Basic R [CodeSchool](http://tryr.codeschool.com) ```F HO```
- Modern R [DataCamp](http://datacamp.com) ```F/*  HO```
- Statistics R [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/specialization/jhudatascience) ```F HO```
- [R-bloggers](http://www.r-bloggers.com/) ```F```
- [Advanced R programming](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/) ```F```
- [Writing R packages](http://r-pkgs.had.co.nz/) ```F```

### In-person
- R user groups e.g. [LondonR](http://www.londonr.org/) ```F```
- Training courses e.g. [Mango](mailto://training@mango-solutions.com) ```*```
- Conferences e.g. [EARL](http://www.earl-conference.com/) and [My training day @ SQLSaturday](http://sqlsatexeter.azurewebsites.net/?page_id=342) ```* HO```
